lead_paragraph: If Bulgaria declares war on Russia it will be for the same reason she adhered to the Rome-Berlin-Tokyo compact last March -- because Adolf Hitler ordered it. Then he demanded and received permission to march Nazi armies across the little Balkan country in order to attack Greece, which was successfully resisting the Italian assault.
